item.title: Cambrian-1: A Fully Open, Vision-Centric Exploration of Multimodal LLMs
item.description: Cambrian-1: Open, vision-centric multimodal LLMs achieve state-of-the-art performance using a novel spatial vision aggregator and high-quality data.

item.title: Non-convolutional graph neural networks.
item.description: RUM neural network, a novel non-convolutional GNN, overcomes limitations of conventional convolution-based models by using RNNs to merge topological and semantic features along random walks, achieving…

item.title: Unlocking Tokens as Data Points for Generalization Bounds on Larger Language Models
item.description: Unlocking tight generalization bounds for massive LLMs using a novel token-level approach.
